Title: Relates to the timeliness of disclosure of a breach of the security of a system that contains private information
Summary: Relates to the timeliness of disclosure of a breach of the security of a system that contains private information; removes language that a fee be paid when a freeze is lifted; and requires a security freeze be lifted within one business day of a request.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the timeliness of disclosure of a breach of the security of a system that contains private information
